name: Teeth Thief
description:
Teeth thief is a game where you play as the tooth fairy, a legendary myth whom plays an important role in a children's oral development. Collect all of the tooths without getting spotted to ensure that you stay as a myth while having a real impact on children's lives.

Yodhin Singh, Martin Rose-Harriott, Khash Namdar, Karishma Patil, Rafid Naeem
